fields.Name: CSV Parser
fields.Description: Parse CSV data into structured JSON with configurable options for headers, delimiters, and data handling

fields.Name: FileID
fields.Description: UUID of MJ Storage file (alternative to CSVData)

fields.Name: FileURL
fields.Description: URL of CSV file (alternative to CSVData)

fields.Name: HasHeaders
fields.Description: Boolean indicating if first row contains headers

fields.Name: TrimValues
fields.Description: Boolean to trim whitespace from values

fields.Name: ParsedData
fields.Description: Array of objects (if headers) or array of arrays
File ID or URL not found

fields.Name: JSON Transform
fields.Description: Transform JSON data using JSONPath or JMESPath expressions for flexible data manipulation

fields.Name: InputData
fields.Description: JSON object or array to transform

fields.Name: TransformType
fields.Description: Type of transformation: JSONPath or JMESPath

fields.Name: Multiple
fields.Description: Return all matches vs first match

fields.Name: XML Parser
fields.Description: Parse XML data and extract values using XPath expressions with namespace support

fields.Name: FileID
fields.Description: UUID of MJ Storage file containing XML

fields.Name: NamespaceMap
fields.Description: Object mapping namespace prefixes to URIs

fields.Name: Aggregate Data
fields.Description: Perform aggregation operations on data arrays including sum, average, min, max, count, and group by
Specified field not found in data

fields.Name: Data Mapper
fields.Description: Transform data using Nunjucks templates for flexible and powerful data mapping

fields.Name: SourceData
fields.Description: Input object or array to transform

fields.Name: MappingTemplate
fields.Description: Nunjucks template string or object with templates

fields.Name: TemplateType
fields.Description: Type of template: string or object

fields.Name: PDF Generator
fields.Description: Generate PDF documents from HTML or Markdown content with customizable formatting

fields.Name: Content
fields.Description: HTML or Markdown content to convert

fields.Name: ContentType
fields.Description: Type of content: html or markdown

fields.Name: OutputFileID
fields.Description: Save PDF to MJ Storage with this ID

fields.Name: FileID
fields.Description: MJ Storage file ID if saved
PDF generated and saved to storage

fields.Name: PDF Extractor
fields.Description: Extract text, metadata, and pages from PDF files

fields.Name: FileID
fields.Description: MJ Storage file ID of PDF

fields.Name: ExtractType
fields.Description: Type of extraction: text, metadata, or pages
Failed to extract content from PDF

fields.Name: Excel Reader
fields.Description: Read Excel files and convert to JSON with support for specific sheets and ranges

fields.Name: FileID
fields.Description: MJ Storage file ID of Excel file

fields.Name: SheetInfo
fields.Description: Information about sheets in the file

fields.Name: Excel Writer
fields.Description: Create Excel files from JSON data with support for multiple sheets and formatting

fields.Name: Sheets
fields.Description: Array of sheet definitions with data

fields.Name: OutputFileID
fields.Description: Save Excel file to MJ Storage

fields.Name: FileID
fields.Description: MJ Storage file ID if saved
Excel file created and saved to storage
Invalid data format for Excel creation

fields.Name: File Compress
fields.Description: Compress or decompress files using ZIP format with configurable compression levels

fields.Name: Files
fields.Description: Array of file objects for compression

fields.Name: HTTP Request
fields.Description: Make HTTP requests with full control over headers, authentication, and request options

fields.Name: Method
fields.Description: HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

fields.Name: BodyType
fields.Description: Body type: json, form, text, or binary

fields.Name: GraphQL Query
fields.Description: Execute GraphQL queries and mutations with variable support

fields.Name: OAuth Flow
fields.Description: Handle OAuth 2.0 authentication flows including authorization code and client credentials

fields.Name: Operation
fields.Description: OAuth operation: GetAuthorizationURL, ExchangeCodeForToken, RefreshToken, or ClientCredentials
Failed to exchange code for token

fields.Name: API Rate Limiter
fields.Description: Add rate limiting to any API endpoint with automatic retry and backoff

fields.Name: RateLimitKey
fields.Description: Unique key for rate limiter instance

fields.Name: Password Strength
fields.Description: Check password strength and generate secure passwords using zxcvbn analysis

fields.Name: Conditional
fields.Description: Execute different actions based on a condition evaluation

fields.Name: Context
fields.Description: Object with variables for condition evaluation

fields.Name: TrueAction
fields.Description: Action configuration to run if true

fields.Name: FalseAction
fields.Description: Action configuration to run if false

fields.Name: Loop
fields.Description: Iterate over collections executing actions for each item with parallel processing support

fields.Name: Action
fields.Description: Action configuration to execute per item

fields.Name: Results
fields.Description: Array of results from each iteration

fields.Name: Parallel Execute
fields.Description: Execute multiple actions in parallel with configurable concurrency and completion modes

fields.Name: Actions
fields.Description: Array of action configurations to execute

fields.Name: WaitForAll
fields.Description: Wait for all vs return first result

fields.Name: Retry
fields.Description: Retry failed actions with exponential backoff and configurable retry conditions

fields.Name: Delay
fields.Description: Add fixed or random delays to workflows for timing control

fields.Name: DelayType
fields.Description: Type of delay: fixed or random

fields.Name: Message
fields.Description: Optional message to include in result

fields.Name: Slack Webhook
fields.Description: Send messages to Slack channels via incoming webhooks with rich formatting support

fields.Name: Teams Webhook
fields.Description: Send messages to Microsoft Teams channels via incoming webhooks with card formatting

fields.Name: Execute AI Prompt
fields.Description: Execute MemberJunction AI prompts with variable substitution and model overrides

fields.Name: PromptName
fields.Description: Name of the AI prompt to execute
Prompt is not in active status

fields.Name: Perplexity Search
fields.Description: Performs AI-powered web search using Perplexity's Search API. Returns comprehensive search results with citations, related questions, and optional images. Supports advanced filtering by domain and recency.

fields.Name: Query
fields.Description: The search query text (required). Can be a question or topic to search for.

fields.Name: Model
fields.Description: Perplexity model to use (default: llama-3.1-sonar-small-128k-online). Options: llama-3.1-sonar-small-128k-online, llama-3.1-sonar-large-128k-online, llama-3.1-sonar-huge-128k-online

fields.Name: Temperature
fields.Description: Sampling temperature 0-2 (default: 0.2). Lower values make output more focused and deterministic.

fields.Name: TopP
fields.Description: Nucleus sampling threshold (default: 0.9). Controls diversity of output.

fields.Name: ReturnImages
fields.Description: Include images in search results (default: false)

fields.Name: ReturnRelatedQuestions
fields.Description: Include related questions in results (default: false)

fields.Name: SearchDomainFilter
fields.Description: Array of domains to limit/exclude search. Use '-' prefix to exclude a domain (e.g., ['-example.com'] excludes example.com). Can be an array or comma-separated string.

fields.Name: Content
fields.Description: The AI-generated search result content with citations

fields.Name: Citations
fields.Description: Array of citation URLs used in the response

fields.Name: CitationCount
fields.Description: Number of citations in the response

fields.Name: Images
fields.Description: Array of image URLs (only present if ReturnImages is true)

fields.Name: ImageCount
fields.Description: Number of images returned (only present if ReturnImages is true)

fields.Name: RelatedQuestions
fields.Description: Array of related question strings (only present if ReturnRelatedQuestions is true)

fields.Name: RelatedQuestionCount
fields.Description: Number of related questions (only present if ReturnRelatedQuestions is true)

fields.Name: Usage
fields.Description: Token usage statistics object with prompt_tokens, completion_tokens, and total_tokens

fields.Name: SearchResultDetails
fields.Description: Complete search result object including query, model, content, citations, images, related questions, usage, and finish reason
Perplexity API key not found. Provide ApiKey parameter or set PERPLEXITY_API_KEY environment variable

fields.Name: Gamma Generate Presentation
fields.Description: Generates presentations, documents, or social media posts using Gamma's AI-powered Generations API. Creates professional slides from text input with customizable themes, images, and export formats.

fields.Name: InputText
fields.Description: Text to generate content from (required, 1-750,000 characters). This is the main content that will be used to create the presentation.

fields.Name: TextMode
fields.Description: How to process text - 'generate' (default, AI creates new content), 'condense' (summarize), or 'preserve' (use as-is)

fields.Name: ThemeName
fields.Description: Visual theme name for the presentation (optional). Examples: Modern, Classic, Bold, etc.

fields.Name: NumCards
fields.Description: Number of slides/cards to generate (1-75, depends on account tier)

fields.Name: CardSplit
fields.Description: How to split content into cards - 'auto' (default, AI decides) or 'inputTextBreaks' (use line breaks from input)

fields.Name: AdditionalInstructions
fields.Description: Custom guidance for content generation (optional). Provide specific instructions to tailor the output.

fields.Name: ExportAs
fields.Description: Export format - 'pdf' or 'pptx' (optional). If specified, the presentation will be exported in this format.

fields.Name: TextAmount
fields.Description: Amount of text per slide - 'auto', 'minimal', 'moderate', or 'detailed'

fields.Name: TextLanguage
fields.Description: Language for content (optional). Use ISO 639-1 codes like 'en', 'es', 'fr', etc.

fields.Name: PollStatus
fields.Description: Poll for completion status (default: true). If false, returns immediately with generationId.

fields.Name: PollInterval
fields.Description: Seconds between status checks when polling (default: 5)

fields.Name: MaxPollTime
fields.Description: Maximum seconds to poll before timeout (default: 300)

fields.Name: GenerationId
fields.Description: Unique identifier for the generation request. Can be used to check status later.

fields.Name: GammaUrl
fields.Description: URL to the generated Gamma presentation (only present when generation completes)

fields.Name: Credits
fields.Description: Credits usage information object (only present when generation completes)
Generation started but polling disabled - use GenerationId to check status
InputText must be between 1 and 750,000 characters
Gamma API key not found. Set gammaApiKey in mj.config.cjs or GAMMA_API_KEY environment variable
Invalid Gamma API key. Verify your API key is correct and has proper permissions
Gamma API rate limit exceeded (50 presentations per day during beta)
Generation timed out - use GenerationId to check status later

fields.Name: Get Records
fields.Description: Generic action for retrieving multiple records from any entity with filtering and sorting capabilities. Supports SQL WHERE clause filters, ORDER BY sorting, and result limits.

fields.Name: EntityName
fields.Description: The name of the entity to query (e.g., 'Events')

fields.Name: Filter
fields.Description: SQL WHERE clause filter expression (e.g., "Status = 'Active' AND StartDate >= GETDATE()")

fields.Name: OrderBy
fields.Description: SQL ORDER BY clause (e.g., "StartDate ASC, EventName ASC")

fields.Name: MaxRows
fields.Description: Maximum number of records to return (default: 100, max: 10000)

fields.Name: IncludeCount
fields.Description: Include total count in results (default: true)
